form.label: Knowledge Object Lookup by Name and Type
form.searchTemplate: | inputlookup lookup_ko | where match(name,"(?i)$ko$") AND match(level,"$app$") | search type="$type$" | fields name level type path | sort name level type | table name type level path | rename name as "Knowledge Object" type as "Type" level as "Level" path as "Located in File"

input.label: Type
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup lookup_ko | stats count by type

input.label: App
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup lookup_ko | rex field=level "app:(?<appName>\S+)" | stats count by appName

row.html:
You may enter
the exact name of the knowledge object,
part of the name of the object, or
a regular expression
The simple wildcard (*) does not work for this search.
The search is case-insensitive.
